nodes.text: Unit 6 was the designation of at least one of Galactic Empire's stormtroopers stationed at Timira City on the planet Kamino. The designation was in use by the Imperial Military as part of the Stormtrooper Corps. In 1 BBY, Unit 6 tried to stop Starkiller, an escaped clone of the Sith Lord Darth Vader's late Sith apprentice Galen Marek, from escaping the planet.
The unit fought against Starkiller near Barracks D4, and one trooper reported that the barracks suffered severe structural damage.
Ultimately, the clone managed to escape.
Unit 6 first appeared in the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, released on October 26, 2010. The game does not specify whether it is a single trooper or a squad.
During each playthrough, the quote is randomized, meaning the stormtrooper reports the damage varies each time, and Unit 6 may or may not mention the barracks.
